recommended_degree: Administrasi, Logistik Perdagangan Internasional, Manajemen Perdagangan, Perdagangan Internasional Wilayah Asean dan RRT (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
* Assist in sourcing suppliers, gathering quotations, and comparing price offers.
* Support the procurement team in processing purchase requests and preparing purchase orders.
* Help maintain and update supplier databases, product lists, and procurement records.
* Coordinate with vendors to follow up on orders, delivery schedules, and required documents.
* Assist in evaluating supplier performance based on quality, price, and delivery timelines.
* Support inventory monitoring by checking stock levels and notifying the team of replenishment needs.
* Ensure all procurement documents are properly filed and comply with company procedures.
* Assist in preparing reports, spreadsheets, and summaries related to procurement activities.
* Communicate effectively with internal departments to clarify needs and ensure smooth procurement processes.
* Perform other procurement-related administrative tasks as assigned by the supervisor.
